definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (Thes ‘ fill ’ of earth, earthwork, but v. GFM: Ju Jdg 9:6);—
[[בֵּית מִלּוֹא]] Ju Jdg 9:6 (‖[[בַּעֲלֵי שְׁכֶם]]) so v:Jdg 9:20, v:Jdg 9:20; near Shechem, site unknown; LXX o)=kov Bhqmaalwn.
citadel in Jerus. [[הַמִּלּוֹא]] 2Sa 5:9, 1Ki 9:15, 1Ki 9:24, 1Ki 11:27, 1Ch 11:8, 2Ch 32:5. LXX usu. h( a)/kra (A 1Ki 9:15, 1Ki 9:24 also Melw).
